The character treats all Common and Scholastic
Lore Skills as Basic Skills. This Talent also provides a +10

content:
The character has been infused with a great wealth of lore and
knowledge, either through punishing noetic techniques or by
arcane methods kept secret by the guardians of technology and
knowledge. The character treats all Common and Scholastic
Lore Skills as Basic Skills. This Talent also provides a +10
bonus to any tests involving Common or Scholastic Lore for
which the character already possesses the Skill.
